title: Error code 004
body:
Hi , i'm Yan Lol nick is : MMC Yan server euw .
Yesterday i bought a new computer and I tried to download league of legends but it keep saying: Patching failed and we're not sure why.
Please restart the client to try parching again.( error code 004 ).
Pls help me I need to rank to plat 5 it's almost end of the season help meee! 
Thanks for all the answers.

replies.body: That 004 error code typically means that the patcher wasn't able to update the game files due to a lack of OS admin rights. Run through the steps in our [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and make sure you're running the client as admin and you should be good to go.
